description: Maximal number of distinct prime factors of any composite number between n-th and (n+1)st primes.
example: n=36, p(36)=199, next prime is 211. In between, the number of prime factors for {200,201,...,210} is {2,2,2,2,3,2,2,2,2,2,4}of which the maximum is 4 arising at 210. So a(36)=4.
author: _Labos Elemer_, Feb 09 2000
